Name: Neon Tide
About the game: ABOUT: The year is 2048. A virus known as 'Neon Tide' spreads throughout robots in an unknown fashion. It's your job to unlock the cause of the virus and find a way to stop it. FEATURES: Neon Tide is a visual novel where you explore a cyberpunk style world as three characters; Beta (a hologram who wishes he were human) Lucy (an affected robot who fights for the equality of her race) Victoria (an affected robot who wants humans and robots to co-exist together) Every choice you make in the game affects the story and each choice comes with a consequence. One ending Full sound effects and music, we recommend playing with headphones. Directed by Will Novy Sound Design and Music by: Daemoneyeddeath
